message.content:
cs.GT, cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.MA

The paper proposes a contract-theoretic approach to design mobile data plans, which involves optimizing the pricing strategy for different periods of data usage. This falls under the domain of game theory (cs.GT) and information theory (cs.IT), as the authors analyze the incentive compatibility and individual rationality constraints of consumers. The paper also involves network infrastructure (cs.NI) and security and privacy (cs.CR) aspects, as mobile data plans involve data transmission over networks and require secure payment mechanisms. Finally, the optimization problem can be formulated as a mathematical programming problem (cs.MA).
